A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I thought this movie was entertaining and interesting. I liked what they did with Luke and even though it may not be similar to him in the original trilogy\, I thought it still made sense seeing as he's on an island by himself for years.

[SPOILERS AHEAD]

I also liked that Rey and Snoke weren't tied to the original trilogy. They can make new characters in a new set of movies. Rey doesn't have to be the daughter of Luke or Leia to be cool.
